1.0.0.name: wordpress/gd-bbpress-widgets
1.0.0.description:
Collection of widgets for bbPress plugin powered forums. Currently included widgets:

  • Search Topics (requires GD bbPress Tools plugin)
  • Topics Views (selectable list of views to display)

Supported languages: English.

Important URL's

Plugin Home | Support Forum | Feedburner | Twitter | Facebook Page

More from dev4Press.com for bbPress

  • GD bbPress Attachments - attachments for topics and replies
  • GD bbPress Tools - bbcodes, signature, custom views and more</
